headings: Become part of the next generation of border security and homeland security leaders.
B.S.S. in Border and Homeland Security
What Can You Do With a Border and Homeland Security Degree?
Why Earn My Border and Homeland Security Degree at Angelo State?
Journal of Homeland and National Security Perspectives
paragraphs: Gain in-depth knowledge about border security and other regional, national and international security issues that will prepare you for your career. Fully online, our nationally-recognized program includes a comprehensive degree plan that covers a wide variety of topics, ranging from terrorism and counter-terrorism, international trafficking and federal immigration laws - to chemical, biological and radiological hazards and responses.
*The B.B.S. degree is designed for those who already have an associate degree from the Community College of the Air Force, or who are on active duty, and it is part of theAU-ABC program.
Our border and homeland security professors are recognized experts in their fields. They stay up to date on their research and are regularly sought out as experts by the media.
ASU Distinguished ScholarshipsOur premier scholarships are awarded based on your academic achievement, and you don’t even have to apply. You are automatically considered once you are admitted to ASU.
General ScholarshipsWe offer over 600 different types of scholarships. You can apply for both our general scholarships and degree-specific scholarships with one application.
Blue and Gold GuaranteeIf you have financial need, you may qualify forfree tuitionto attend Angelo State.
The increasing complexity of border security and other national security issues is driving an ongoing demand for border patrol and homeland security professionals.
Earning your border and homeland security degree will prepare you to start or advance your career in the military, border patrol, emergency management or local, state and federal law enforcement.

Angelo State has been designated a “Military Friendly School” and “Military Spouse Friendly School” by VIQTORY Media and G.I. Jobs magazine. We have also been named a Top 10 “Best for Vets College” by the Military Times. Our VETS Center is here to help you with your military education benefits, andTA Scholarshipsare available.

Our online degree in border and homeland security is consistently ranked as one of the best in the country! Currently, we’re ranked as one of the “Best Bachelor’s in Homeland Security Degrees” by CollegeRank.net and BestAccreditedColleges.org, as well as one of the “Best Online Homeland Security Degrees” by PublicServicesDegrees.org.

Students, practitioners, researchers, scholars, policymakers, theorists, and others interested in homeland and national security concerns can voice their thoughts in thisstudent-led peer-reviewed publication.

Take your education to the next level in theASU Honors Program. Through special courses, cultural events, research and community engagement, we’ll help you transform your intellectual and personal talents into marketable skills for your future. You’ll also have the opportunity to participate in prestigious internships, fellowships and other programs to reach your full potential.

OurFreshman Collegeis a one-stop resource for programs and services that help you transition into college life, improve your communication skills, and engage in active learning. You can also get academic help in theMath LabandWriting Center, receive peer mentoring and tutoring throughSupplemental Instruction, or set up onlinetutoringsessions.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
